Articles.Content: After 7 hours of playing I finally got a ship into orbit around Kerban, just thought I'd share my nooby achievement.
If you get to orbit , you are halfway to everywhere!

Nice! For, it took me 433 hrs to land on Mun... I'm too much obsessed by debris and reusable design...

Your next milestones: docking and planetary transfer! Good luck!

For, it took me 433 hrs to land on Mun... I'm too much obsessed by debris...

Ditto, though it didn't take me 433 hours. I was a bit irked after my first "campaign" moonshot as the seperator ring that /should/ have hit the MÃƒÂ¼n along with my stage-2 somehow had just enough momentum to miss. After ~30 launches it became my first piece of unrecoverable space junk... though at least it was ejected from Kerbin orbit.
Congrats Kingfury4, orbiting is not as easy as it looks for a new player
